answerText: Six Characters in Search of an Author [or Sei personaggi in cerca d'autore][10] This Italian Nobel Laureate and author of Right You Are (If You Think You Are) and Henry IV wrote Six Characters in Search of an Author
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Yale A | 20 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One character in this play expresses disappointment at the idea of having to put on a cook's cap and beat eggs, causing his boss to fly into a rage. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which a father, mother, son, step-daughter, boy, and girl interrupt a rehearsal of the play Mixing It Up.
